name: pew pew meteor
description:
Based on the theme "Exploring Borders" of the Play20 GameJam you can play pew pew meteor now.

You play the meteor who is surrounded by many things that try to kill it. Stay alive as long as possible.

You can explore the boundaries of time with stopping everything around you or speeding yourself up.

Controls Left Arrow, A go left Right Arrow, D go right Space, E stop time Shift, Down Arrow speed up

The progress bar on the right bottom shows you for how long you can trigger stopping the time or speeding up.
